metadata.description: The object of the user-assigned managed identity that has permission to create Azure AD applications.
The location in which the resources should be deployed.
The name of the World of Workflows Client Entra Id Application
The name of the World of Workflows Server Entra Id Application
UPN of the admin user to assign to the server enterprise app (e.g. jim@worldofworkflows.com).

appSettings.name: AzureAd__OpenApi__Scopes__ObjectTypes.ReadWrite.All__Description
appSettings.value: Read and write object type definitions

appSettings.name: AzureAd__OpenApi__Scopes__Tasks.Assign.Available__Description
appSettings.value: Assign available tasks to any user

appSettings.name: Workflows__Info__description
appSettings.value: This is the API for this implementation of World of Workflows.

properties.arguments:
[concat(
          '-ResourceGroupName ', resourceGroup().name,
          ' -WebAppName ', '"', parameters('sites_BETemplate_name'), '"',
          ' -ManagedResourceGroup ', '"', resourceGroup().name, '"',
          ' -SubscriptionId ', subscription().subscriptionId,
          ' -AppServicePlanName ', '"', parameters('serverfarms_BETemplatePlan_name'), '"',
          ' -Location ', '"', parameters('location'), '"',
          ' -ClientAppName ', '"', parameters('entraId_Application_ClientName'), '"',
          ' -ServerAppName ', '"', parameters('entraId_Application_ServerName'), '"',
          ' -StorageAccountName ', '"', variables('storageAccountNameFinal'), '"',
          ' -CompanyNameForWoWLicence ', '"', parameters('companyNameForWoWLicence'), '"',
          ' -BillingEmailForWoWLicence ', '"', parameters('billingEmailForWoWLicence'), '"'

        )]
